Rachel V. Seale

Portfolio

Book Club

Interactive Book Club project produced whilst in 2nd year at University of Brighton. It was produced for me to learn new skills in Ajax and PHP. It is a user friendly site thats allows users to sign up and sign in to leave reviews on books, which are then displayed, for other users.

  • HTML
  • CSS
  • JavaScript
  • Design
  • Responsive
  • Ajax

Comic Book Showcase

This is my group showcase piece for one of my modules at uni. The project to was to find a unique and interesting way to present ourseleves to potenial clients. We decided to go for the comic theme, as we thought it be a intresting and fun way to present our skills and personalities.

  • HTML
  • CSS
  • Design
  • Research
  • Devlopment

Digital Technologies

Another uni project of mine was for a module called "Digital Technologies". We had as a group be given a subject then be able to present it in a way that will help and encourage other student to learn. We were given the subject 'Advantages of strongly typed languages,' so after the research we came up with a cool idea for a video.

  • Team Work
  • Development
  • Research
  • iMovie

Shopping Cart proj

This project was one of the first uni projects that involved me using all the skills I had learnt in my first year to create a toy shop. You could choose the quanity of an item and be able to add to the basket which will update.

  • HTML
